para_sentences.para_0: At this point, you should be able to answer all of the following questions.
para_sentences.para_1: If you are unsure of any of these answers, take some time to review the course materials. Feel free to post questions into the General Q&A Discussion. Next week's lessons will be easier if you have invested in mastering this week's learning outcomes.
para_sentences.para_2: Check the Explorations and Task List in the Week 4 - Overview to review learning materials and make sure you have completed all required activities for this week.

ul_0: Identify if a problem has an optimal solution vs the optimal solution?
How to write an algorithm to find an optimal solution?
How to solve an unbounded knapsack problem?
How to solve a 0-1 knapsack problem?
How to identify if a problem can be solved using the backtracking technique?
What is the difference between the problems that can be solved using dynamic programming vs those that can be solved using the backtracking technique?
How to implement a backtracking algorithm?
